name: Siglo
headline: Home Internet for urban Latin America
description: Siglo is a wireless ISP for communities in urban Latin America offering a faster, better, and easy-to-pay service.

founders.name: Joel Phillips, Founder
founders.description:
Founder Siglo (S21), Originally from Colorado but Latam based since 2015, Columbia University Economics, Previously Pig.gi, WhisperShout.

Passion for solving problems in emerging markets with technology. Interested in fintech, decentralized models, blockchain, connectivity, and emerging market economics.

founders.name: Isaac Phillips, Founder
founders.description: From Colorado living in Mexico City. Interested in wireless, digital inclusion, blockchain, financial inclusion, and ed-tech. I love mountains, history, dogs, remote villages, and megacities. Founder of Siglo, previously at Pig.gi, Dish Mexico, & Echostar.

[Quiero saber más](https://siglo.com/</beneficios>)
##  Preguntas frecuentes 
[Ver todas](https://siglo.com/</faqs>)
¿Qué requisitos piden para tener Internet Siglo? 
Que el domicilio donde quieres el servicio esté dentro de nuestra zona de cobertura; estar presente tú o una persona mayor de 18 años en el domicilio de instalación para darle acceso a nuestro equipo técnico; tener acceso a tu techo/azotea para la instalación de nuestra antena. 
¿Qué incluye mi paquete o plan de servicio? 
Sin importar el valor de tu paquete, tu plan incluye navegación sin límite de gigas por el tiempo que recargues a una velocidad promedio de descarga y subida de hasta 100 Megas. 
¿En qué lugares puedo hacer el pago de mi servicio? 
Puedes recargar tu cuenta en efectivo en cualquier local OXXO, Bodega Aurrera, Walmart o Sam's Club de la República; con transferencia electrónica o depósito en sucursal en Banco Azteca o BBVA; y con cargo a tu tarjeta de débito o crédito ingresando a tu cuenta en siglo.com 
¿Tienen plazo forzoso? 
No, Siglo es un servicio de Internet Prepago. Eso quiere decir que no tenemos plazos forzosos ni compromisos de permanencia. 
¿Cuánto cuesta la instalación? 
La instalación, el modem y los días establecidos en el paquete seleccionado, deben ser liquidados al momento de instalar el servicio y dejarlo activo en el domicilio del cliente.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Siglo**

**Mission:** Siglo is on a mission to provide home internet service for urban Latin America. 

**Founded:** 2020, as part of Y Combinator's Batch S21.

**Location:** Based in Mexico City, Mexico.

**Team Size:** Consists of 20 dedicated employees.

**What They Do:** Siglo started out as a wireless Internet Service Provider (ISP) specifically catering to urban communities in Latin America. Their aim is to deliver a faster, more reliable, and user-friendly internet experience that prioritizes easy payment options. Siglo offers a range of prepaid internet plans with no long-term commitments, allowing users to choose their duration of service — from 30 days to just a week. They provide unlimited speed up to 100 Megabits, which is particularly appealing for those working, studying, or entertaining at home.

**Payment Flexibility:** Their innovative approach allows customers to decide how they pay for their internet, be it monthly, bi-weekly, or weekly, all through a straightforward process. Users can recharge their accounts at numerous locations, including local grocery and convenience stores.

**Group Partner:** Associated with **Nan**.

**Tags:** Siglo is categorized under ['fintech', 'community', 'telecommunications'], highlighting its blend of financial tech in a community-centered service in the telecommunications space.

**Incentives:** They have a referral program where existing customers can earn credits for bringing in new users, promoting a community-like sharing model.

**Contact Information:** For support or inquiries, customers can reach out via their website, or contact them directly through WhatsApp or phone at +52 55 9225 6363.

In essence, Siglo is a promising player in the tech landscape, leveraging a unique model designed to enhance internet accessibility and affordability in urban Latin America. The world is steadily moving towards digital, and companies like Siglo are key to ensuring that no one is left behind in the internet race.
